short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will create poster images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UrBeeGee helps create high definition backdrop style images for use in your virtual meetings. Just upload the image's ( for example, school logo or company logo, club logo, custom image), crop, rotate, size to your specifications and the UrBeeGee app will create the backdrop style image in seconds for you to download or purchase printing with shipment to your location.
